name: Project Noir
description:
Project Noir is a crime solving game, with detectives Ward and Mclane.

It's couch co-op so you'll need 2 Xbox controllers. 

Player 1 plays as the field detective gathering clues and delivering them to player 2 by the phone, then player 2 interrogates the suspect.

 Left joystick to move around, A button to interact with objects and people when you look at them and left joystick to navigate menu and dialogue options, lastly B button to get back out of evidence view menu from the detective desk.

When you are ready, make a conviction, who do you seem guilty?

We hope you enjoy our game!
